author.name: Author Name, it can hold 256 characters

ping.title: This is your title, it can hold 256 characters
ping.description: This is the main body of text, it can hold 2048 characters.

fields.name: This is a single field title, it can hold 256 characters
fields.value: This is a field value, it can hold 1024 characters.

fields.name: Inline fields
fields.value: They can have different fields with small headlines, and you can inline them.

fields.name: Masked links
fields.value: You can put [masked links](https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/master/class/MessageEmbed) inside of rich embeds.

fields.name: Markdown
fields.value: You can put all the *usual* **__Markdown__** inside of them.

footer.text: This is the footer text, it can hold 2048 characters
